document_data.mainbody:
sterils Way was a small road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Asterils Way was located in Waterdeeps Dock Ward. It originated on Sternpost Street near the intersection with Ship Street, branching south then southwest to end on Dock Street on the waterfront. Several unnamed alleys branched off of the southeast side of Asterils Way
* Shipwrights House
